title: Ranked Team LF ADC and Jungler.
body:
My ranked team consists of me (Diamond V), Escath (Diamond IV) and Chewie (Platinum I), and we're looking for solid players to go through Ranked 5's with us.  
We're not picky on how good you are currently. We're just looking for people who are willing to learn how to play the game well. That being said, our minimum rank for application will be Gold V.  

Edit: Teamspeak is highly recommended, but having a mic is not. Just need you guys to be able to listen to us.
  
Please be comfortable with the roles of ADC and Jungler, as we are not changing our positions.  
TL;DR: ADC/Jungler needed. Gold V or more required.

replies.body:
hi i can play very good adc and decent support i need to be able to communicate with other people and have good teamwork other than that its all good i log in twice a day

Ranked Platinum 5

Best ADC;Quinn,Lucian,Draven,Graves
Best SUPPORT;Thresh,Blitzcrank,Leona,Braum
Diamond IV Jungle main massive champ pool available almost every night. Add me IGN: JinXv
Gold V jungler only at gold v because i just stop there for ranked rewards. I can play pretty much every champ.

Hello, I'm silver 5, last season gold 1, please dont push aside my application because im s5 this season, there's reason behind that.

Firstly I'd like to say, I'm 21 years of age, I have played a large amount of MMOs and i know what it takes to be a team player. If you've heard of smite, i'm diamond 2 on that mmo I was a Support/Jungle main, I'm wanting to try out for LoL Teams, I take competitive gameplay very serious and would like to get better at the game in a team environment.

I got all Coms and a very clear mic, I own all champions but 3, bard, tahm kench and kog maw.

IGN: Alcoholic.

This application is for Jungler.
Diamond adc main Add SivirOnly if you want me

Currently at Plat V with peak being plat III. I am a ADC main. Would love to learn how to play better. Will try to use any advice given. 
I have skype.
Added you in game
ign: chicks chase elo
champ pool: I can play trist and graves very well along with a decent jinx,kalista, corki and tried my hand at draven a few times with varying success.

hello currently ranked at gold 5 so I am just hitting minimum requirement so if you decide to not even add me no hard feelings. 
I have been playing since early season 2 from what i remember though it could be as early as late season 1. I would say i have a pretty good knowledge of the game for example champs, items etc.. i also feel i am decent when it comes to mechanics in game such dodging, landing skill shots so on. I do however believe i could improve on my decision making in games sometimes ill end up dead and think what the hell was i thinking, as well as having games were i have barely average to not so good Cs. I am willing to play either ADC or jungle though i feel my adc might be a little bit stronger depending which champs you guys want me to play. Anyway IGN: Hashshashin

Hey man, I'd be very keen to play if you're interested
Ad and jg are my prefered roles so I'm happy to do either

I'll be good to play whenever 
Let me know of you're interested
Am currently plat V but always room to improve

Have a good one

I sent you an add on league (y)
